graph.description: biopython - http://biopython.org blast - http://blast.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi blat - http://genome.ucsc.edu bowtie - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net bowtie2 - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2 bwa - http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net bx-python - https://pypi.python.org/pypi/bx-python Cufflinks - http://cufflinks.cbcb.umd.edu/ dendropy - http://pythonhosted.org/DendroPy/ edena - http://www.genomic.ch/edena.php fastqc - http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/ fastx - http://hannonlab.cshl.edu/fastx_toolkit GenomeAnalysisTK - http://www.broadinstitute.org/gatk gmap_gsnap (Genomic Mapping and Alignment Program,Genomic Short-read Nucleotide Alignment Program - http://research-pub.gene.com/gmap/ htseq - http://www-huber.embl.de/users/anders/HTSeq idba-ud - http://i.cs.hku.hk/~alse/hkubrg/projects/idba_ud/index.html miRDeep2 - https://www.mdc-berlin.de/8551903/en/research/research_teams/systems_biology_of_gene_regulatory_elements/projects/miRDeep picard - http://picard.sourceforge.net/ pysam - https://github.com/pysam-developers randfold http://bioinformatics.psb.ugent.be/software/details/Randfold squid http://selab.janelia.org/software.html qiime - http://qiime.org samtools - http://samtools.sourceforge.net soapdenovo - http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapdenovo.html SOAPsnp - http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapsnp.html spades - http://bioinf.spbau.ru/en/spades Tophat - http://tophat.cbcb.umd.edu/ trimmomatic - http://www.usadellab.org/cms/?page=trimmomatic trinity (Inchworm, Chrysalis,Butterfly) - http://trinityrnaseq.sourceforge.net/ velvet - http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~zerbino/velvet viennaRNA - http://www.tbi.univie.ac.at/~ronny/RNA/index.html
